website_summaries.verdict: With 10 independent air chambers, this airbed accommodates a higher weight limit than almost any other car mattress on the market.
pros: Includes electric pump, repair pad, and glue kits
Good for long road trips and for pets

customer_reviews.title: Beagle love it. It fits perfectly in my 2012 F350 ...
customer_reviews.text: After researching LOTS of "inflatable mattress's for my F350, I purchased this one. My 150 lbs. Lab and 26 lbs. Beagle love it. It fits perfectly in my 2012 F350 crew cab with the Plush Paws Pet Seat Cover. The inflatable part that goes on the floor is the perfect height for a truck. Several I researched are for cars and not high enough for truck seats. I sepulchered this so my dogs could travel in comfort and not fall off the seat but I think this would also be great for a person to sleep on if needed.
customer_reviews.author: P. Coe

customer_reviews.title: It inflates easily and the little pump is handy
customer_reviews.text: It inflates easily and the little pump is handy. The little pillow aren't worth having but I guess they would do in a pinch. My biggest complaint is that it doesn't actually go all the way across the truck. It's about 8-10" short which leaves my feet unsupported and I'm only 5-10. I also wish they would have made the bed part a little thicker towards the seat so it would really sit level. Right now it leans towards the back because of the natural seat contour.Overall it's not bad though.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is such a great item that we're buying one for our son's car ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to make a 4 hour trip easier on dogs. We set up just before new years, the included air pump took only minutes to inflate, and put an egg crate pad on top so they wouldn't puncture it. It worked exactly as we hoped and stayed fully inflated for a month when we took it down. This is such a great item that we're buying one for our son's car too!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: NOT RECOMMENDED, VERY DISAPPOINTING
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended. If you have a quick road trip and can't afford or have time for a hotel this will work. But even though it says Heavy Duty in the name, it's not. After a few days use it was leaking. After a week the baffles inside had split and it wouldn't hold air throughout the night. In my opinion your be better off buying one of those foam mattress toppers and rolling it up when you are done.
customer_reviews.author: K C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Works and fits great. Not really heavy duty as advertised though. Bought 2 of these and 1 is already no good after 3 uses due to small hole on seem and won't hold air. Can't patch either due to hole being on seem. May have been due to seat belt. Not sure what else could have caused it seeing how it was never taken out after installing. Other than that, very comfortable and easy to install. Note: may want to lay something down underneath it first to protect it as we did on the second one.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D.

customer_reviews.title: Busted at the seams!
customer_reviews.text: Had it for less than 2 months and the seems are leaking in several areas...even when I patched the leak, still doesn't hold air, now its useless
customer_reviews.author: M. Madalone

customer_reviews.title: VERY disappointing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Main part deflated the first time I used it. It was also about a foot shorter than the length of my back seat, and I just have a Dodge 1500, nothing huge. Pump worked well, the mattress inflated easily. However, I could feel the main part getting soft before I even laid down for the night. By half way through the night I was just laying on my back seat. It was completely deflated. The compartments that inserted into the leg spaces in front of the seat stayed mostly inflated, so at least I was able to stay somewhat level when I slept. I would definitely NOT recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: N. Grace

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: In theory, this product should work. In reality, it is an air mattress with air mattress problems. In practice, it arrived with a hole in it and didn't hold air. The seller was unreachable. After arguing with Amazon customer service for hours, Amazon agreed to refund without finding the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Sam

customer_reviews.title: held up remarkably well
customer_reviews.text: I took this on a trip across the US and back (GA to CA) in my 2005 Toyota Camry and it held up remarkably well. I traveled for 15 days and slept on it for 7 of those nights. It lost very little air, so little in fact that I never had to refill it. I only wish it was easier to fold up after use, but given the design, that is likely impossible. It might deserve 5 stars, but I am a tough 5.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Bauer

customer_reviews.title: This has been the best solution for traveling with my dog in the car
customer_reviews.text: The solution that I needed for traveling with my dog. He can stay in the back while I am driving without the fear of him falling off the seat with sudden stops. I cover the mattress with a waterproof hammock type cover to prevent him from putting holes in the mattress. This has been the best solution for traveling with my dog in the car!
customer_reviews.author: E. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This mattress lasted me a solid year and half of frequent usage. I'd use it two nights a week on trips, averaging 2-3 trips a month, and would leave it inflated during the day between those two nights, in the southeastern's heat. When I was done, it stayed in my truck (deflated), and would constantly have items stowed on top of it. I would say it's a great deal, and I'm coming back to buy another one. Mine finally developed an irreparable leak at a seam.
customer_reviews.author: NSK

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a truck driver, and we got this inflatable mattress for him because nothing else really worked. So far he loves it , he sleeps on it approximately 2-3 nights per week in his truck. He said it is very comfortable, does not take much space when he deflates it.
customer_reviews.author: UnicornLife

customer_reviews.title: My dog loved it but after only a few uses the baffles ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this mattress in my van to provide a large area for my dog when I traveled. I protected it with a hammock style seat cover that fastened on the headrests of the second row and front row seats, completely covering the mattress. My dog loved it but after only a few uses the baffles in the top mattress part separated rendering it completely useless. This product was way too expensive for the quality of the product. Good idea if it had lasted.
customer_reviews.author: ajh

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mattress for my 2012 Ram 1500 crew cab truck, I use it when I go on long distance trips or over night ATV trips. Fits perfect in the back seat and very comfortable. The air pump and pillow that is included with this product very convenient and works great, making set up easy and fast. Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cmorgan13

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my 10 pound dog in a Ford Flex. The wells were a bit short and did not touch the floor but it was easy enough to build up a base with a few plastic containers I had laying around. It was perfect for our long trip. I even enjoyed a snooze with him while my husband drove. I have suggested this product to MANY friends. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Tucci

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size and easy to remove when we have friends travel with us.
customer_reviews.text: We have a 2018 Jeep Cherokee and this fits perfectly. We bought this for our two dogs, and this keeps them off the seats and gives them plenty of room to lay down. UPDATE: We bought this in November 2017 (9 months ago) because it says it will support 800 lbs. It has since developed a leak along a seam for the floor support. I'm going to try and patch it, but I'm doubtful it will hold.
customer_reviews.author: Grizzlys of COS

customer_reviews.title: The best truck accessory
customer_reviews.text: We use the hell out of it! People always ask us about it. It's a great way to get the most out of your crew cab's back seat while traveling!
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Not “heavy duty”
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived and got it aired up. Seems really cheap and not at all “heavy duty.” Im also annoyed that it’s green when nowhere on in the description does it say the item will be green.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Product was not what was advertised on Amazon. Was much smaller. Would not fit an F150
customer_reviews.author: jacalaq

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, one use, has worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Used for the first time in the back cab of our Dodge Ram 1500 for my 11 year old 5” daughter. It did not go all the way to the end by one door but that didn’t seem to matter. A pillow filled the small gap. Otherwise it filled up the rest of the back seat nicely and stayed full the 2 nights on a camping trip that she used it. I took a nap on it and slept fine. So far so good for our first use.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not very impreseed used it once and it went flat twice during the night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There was a whole
customer_reviews.text: I should have listen to the reviews The same day I got it I blew it up and there was already a whole Guess I have to use the one patch they give me do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Watson

customer_reviews.title: try things immediately - or buy local with good return policy
customer_reviews.text: we purchased a while back but just now opened to use-Grrrr it won't even hold air. Money down the drain
customer_reviews.author: Keith Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk would not hold air for a day brand new. Seller of product never responded on problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad idea
customer_reviews.text: Just opened up a brand new one and it doesn’t hold air? Garbage! Amazon says there are no other alternatives so they will refund me the 50 dollars that I spent on this POS! Beware!
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Happy Traveler
customer_reviews.text: A space n life saver. Used it over 4 yrs traveling back n forth from Chgo to NJ n back while daughter was at college... Got some great naps, very comfortable and perfect temperature...
customer_reviews.author: SMAJ37

customer_reviews.title: TRips to Penn State and Syracuse are AWESOME now! Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Honestly - This has changed my life. TRips to Penn State and Syracuse are AWESOME now! Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stang67

customer_reviews.title: bad
customer_reviews.text: lasted all of about 45 minutes, waste of time and money
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mast

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome in a F350 crew cab
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to allow more room for pups in the back seat. Works awesome in a F350 crew cab.
customer_reviews.author: Walt Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality! Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: It last just 24 hours and than dead. I’m tired to try it! Don’t loose your money!
customer_reviews.author: Emre

customer_reviews.title: Great for pets and great if you want to take ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for pets and great if you want to take a nap. I also bought one for a friend and they love it for their pets.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The baffles for the feet worked just fine. The mattress did not hold air more than 10 minutes. I looked for a hole and could not find any and I used water to help. I would not recommend this product. Go to a reputable camping store or travel camper store for the money you will spend. I wished I would have followed my own advise.
customer_reviews.author: Dissatisfied

customer_reviews.title: Easy to open and install in rear seat
customer_reviews.text: I traveled through all the U.S. for 6 months and this rear seat bed saved me from spending too much money on hotels. Easy to open and install in rear seat. It was comfortable and quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Toua Herr Insurance Agency

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We were unable to use this item due to our ages,88 and 83. It did not fit the seat where we would be able to get on it, it appeared to be a great item otherwise, i have returned it and received my refund FAST! Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Berneil Clawson

customer_reviews.title: Big money saver
customer_reviews.text: Used this in my hotshot truck. 08 Sierra 3500 cc. Worked great. Saved me tons of money in hotels.
customer_reviews.author: graham cook

customer_reviews.title: Great for wireline/ coil tubing nights in the truck
customer_reviews.text: The overall concept is great!! About the 3rd night of using this one side expanded and stretched as the other side was a little flat. Overall it works and it beats sleeping on seat belt buckles.
customer_reviews.author: kevomos

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t hold air right out of box. Not for adult use. May hold air with small child.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not a total waste of money, but works as a last resort
customer_reviews.text: only nick...is it doesnt compensate for the back seats leaning down to the bottom seats. you end up in this awkward position so you dont roll into the crack. needs a bummper on the bottom to make it a level surface.
customer_reviews.author: katy

customer_reviews.title: Good for 1 time use if that use is for 40# child
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a few hours and quickly lost air....fits good in a Ram 1500 but don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Roney

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Dogs
customer_reviews.text: Made traveling for my 2 dogs very comfortable for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M

customer_reviews.title: Works and fits great. Used it for a couple of road trips ...
customer_reviews.text: Works and fits great. Used it for a couple of road trips already. Not much space to sleep but still okay if you like to cuddle. :)
customer_reviews.author: Corina Tinner

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: never made it out of town before loosing its air
customer_reviews.author: Gary White

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: Fits pretty good in my Ford F-350 just needs a little padding on the floor to keep it level
customer_reviews.author: Mallisa Foster

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable — even for traveling with boo-boos
customer_reviews.text: Used this when I recently broke my ankle, had surgery to fix it, and had to travel in backseat over 2000 miles to get to college — did extremely well. Would recommend this to anyone! Best long distance traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Morphew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in King cab truck and SUV. Quality product
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Liked the way it fit and was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Liked the way it fit and was easy to assemble. Very disappointed that the mattress sprang a leak on the very first use. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy-duty
customer_reviews.text: This product lasted about 45 days of off and on use. This product shouldn't be classified as heavy-duty. It is leaking at the seams, which is not repairable.
customer_reviews.author: NanaB

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't move around 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly in my Nissan Pathfinder very comfortable and it doesn't move around. We are using it for a trip to California with our two dogs I'll be able to rest and their going to love being up high and having the freedom to roam. If I was you I'd get this one zero complaints. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Susan Herberholz

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Not durable at all. I used this on the road but didnt last long and I wont buy another one. As far as shipping......it was a super fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Bradford

customer_reviews.title: fits good in my F350
customer_reviews.text: Inflated in the truck to see how it would fit, fits good in my F350. Haven't used it yet however
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes traveling comfortable. Brought in house after day use due to hot weather and was flat by morning.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Dean Janson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its really nice to have and i can sleep well
customer_reviews.author: john combs

customer_reviews.title: Bed in a truck!
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely in ford f 350 truck Pros: easy to use Easy set up Cons: need to have a foam pad ontop for added comfort
customer_reviews.author: sharon buller

customer_reviews.title: Would suggest to a friend, works great
customer_reviews.text: Used it during recent hunting trip, worked great. Held air for several days. Buddy wished he had one.
customer_reviews.author: Brett C Spencer

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend it to anyone. It is literally a piece of crap. It does not work as advertised.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We used it when we went to indiana from Texas. We were happy
customer_reviews.author: Melinda T

customer_reviews.title: It didn't hold air for the price it should have but they got money nothing I can do about it
customer_reviews.text: It did not hold air kept going flat, didn't get a chance to sleep on it, if it held air it would have been nice, and the pillows didn't even take air,
customer_reviews.author: Leo Payment

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t hold air.
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to fill, loses air the second you touch it. Terrible. Straight into the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Mazzoni

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing comes thru on long road trips. Even has little inflatable pillows hahahah
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Too small. Didn't even cover back seat. Leaked within a couple of days. Poor product. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Downs

customer_reviews.title: Pick another brand.
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this when he's working long shifts and can nap in his work truck. It's already deflating and he's only used it a couple of weeks. Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: T Christen

customer_reviews.title: fit perfectly in my Toyota Highlander and made a comfortable bed in the back seat
customer_reviews.text: It came with it's own pump, fit perfectly in my Toyota Highlander and made a comfortable bed in the back seat.
customer_reviews.author: Fishwoman

customer_reviews.title: fits cars too
customer_reviews.text: it even fits in the back of my honda '07 accord

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Worst amazon purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is not at all what it describes in the caption. Aweful buy from overseas so i cant even send it back. Worst amazon purchase yet
customer_reviews.author: Ayla

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit
customer_reviews.text: This mattress did not fit in my Honda CRV so I could not use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: We have a Nissan Quest van and it works well. The van's 12 volt outlet locations makes it a little difficult to fill with air. The pump could use a longer power line. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Hambone

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good quality. We like using it on our camping.
customer_reviews.author: Junalyn Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my parent's Toyota Sequoia. It fit perfectly and they said it was comfortable to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 60 lb dog on our 8 hour drives. Very durable, easy to use, he is much more calm and still.
customer_reviews.author: Chicrob

customer_reviews.title: Sucked, leaked down the same day it was inflated
customer_reviews.text: Sucked, leaked down the same day it was inflated, 400 miles on vacation had to patch the defective liner ( bad seam in liner ), then had to repair the pump before I could inflate the liner. This is the cheapest item that I've purchased. Maybe Trump can make America Great again by getting rid of China products.
customer_reviews.author: Herb M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids, adults and dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2015 Chevy Silverado Crew cab and it fits perfectly in the back. My son used it to sleep on and said it was very comfortable. It also works great when transporting dogs. I have 2 100lb+ dogs ( Great Dane and Lab ). I put this in the back and cover it with some extra protection so their claws won't puncture it. It makes for a great flat surface and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Cheap made. Won’t last longer than 2 weeks. I’ve order 3 in less than a month.
customer_reviews.author: 13rish

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a snooze on the long drives used in 2014 Ram Crewcab was a couple inches short on each side but with pillows and blanket not noticeable inflates fast and was definitely more comfortable then folding the cargo bench out and sleeping on that with cup holder digging in your side. Have only used a couple times but so far holding air fine
customer_reviews.author: Mucka

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! Fit perfectly in the back of 2005 suburban
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Roussel

customer_reviews.title: Fit two kids comfortably, and one adult with a child
customer_reviews.text: It fit well in our 12 passenger van. Fit two kids comfortably, and one adult with a child. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Ibarraa

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: In the first month I had problems with the mattress, it is very weak.I ripped my money
customer_reviews.author: Grasiele Favoreto

customer_reviews.title: This product worked well fitting in the backseat of any ...
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well fitting in the backseat of any car. However, after few monthly of use, it started to leak air, and I have not be able to find the vendor contact through amazon to get the warranty services for repair/exchange. So convenient to use but not durable.
customer_reviews.author: YAJIE

customer_reviews.title: it turned out being one of the best purchases. It's very difficult for me travel long ...
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how this was going to hold up for a long trip in the car. Well, it turned out being one of the best purchases. It's very difficult for me travel long distances in the car but with this it made it so much easier and more enjoyable. I also had my 100lb lab lying on it with me!!!! I had blankets on top and was almost sure it was going to pop! It didn't and I was amazed how well it held up. Thank you for making my trips so much easier and enjoyable!
customer_reviews.author: Debbi

customer_reviews.title: made the back seat of our avalanche very comfortable for a long trip to florida
customer_reviews.text: made the back seat of our avalanche very comfortable for a long trip to florida. size made to fit all but would be nice to be able to order for size seat. an extra 8 inches or so would leave no gaps at doors. as is used an extra pillow to take up the space.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: not good for Q5
customer_reviews.text: Great product but doesn't fit my 2012 audi Q5 to well. It only fits good if I don't blow all the air in and this just doesn't feel right but works perfect for my kids

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: pretty smart invention. loving it so far.
customer_reviews.text: a bit expensive. but i Love it... it fits into my bmw x3 SUV perfectly. very comfortable. material looks pretty durable and thick. not regretting the purchase at all. delivery was quuick and on time. the bed can get hot though if outside is hot, but putting a white non-furry blanket sheet on it should cool down a bit.

customer_reviews.title: Ok, bed.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two, one blew in less than a week, and I had to order another one. I was using it everyday, but hey, "heavy duty is supposed to last longer". Overall, ,a good substitute for the rough backseat of the truck/SUV.

customer_reviews.title: He loves it, it's a bit too short for ...
customer_reviews.text: He loves it, it's a bit too short for our pick-up, but it is saving us lots of money on motel rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Fits well feel good... just lasted a week...
customer_reviews.text: I have a Ram 3500 it fit well in the back. I loved that I could finally sleep more comfortable and able to extend myself. It was a little short from the feet but it's fine since I just put my feet on the arm rest or window idc. The only thing is that it lasted a week. It became undone on one of the area that it's sewed... It was not a hole I know that it was just how it wasn't good.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto A. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Headache stopper
customer_reviews.text: This item made our family trip best ever , completely stopped our 2 children from fighting over space

customer_reviews.title: Great bed I can stop for a nap or sleep ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bed I can stop for a nap or sleep well all night
customer_reviews.author: Jon C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Had surgery. Need to lay down frequently during travel.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth $40 bucks, even if the air pump didn't work!
customer_reviews.text: The car air pump didn't work at all, but that's ok, as air pumps are pretty cheap and I have a battery powered one I keep in my camping gear. Feels very durable, inflates pretty quickly. I would recommend filling most of the way with the pump and then doing it with your own breath to get it filled snugly and a bit quicker. Bout to give it a test with my dog (with a blanket over it for protection) and I'm confident it'll do fine. Great ordering experience from the seller too!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for work truck
customer_reviews.text: Great idea I have sleep in my truck for a couple of years working in the oil field not getting great sleep with this now I do.

customer_reviews.title: But the one night I used it was better than sleeping on the back seat
customer_reviews.text: I was only able to use it once. I deleloped holes in the matress. Still patching holes. But the one night I used it was better than sleeping on the back seat.
customer_reviews.author: Mike J.

customer_reviews.title: ... for a trip from NY to FL but have loved it. Nice
customer_reviews.text: Have only been using it for two days for a trip from NY to FL but have loved it. Nice, comfortable bed for our dog and my hubby and I each took a little nap while the other drove. If it holds up well it is definitely money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Smith

customer_reviews.title: Airless Airbed :(
customer_reviews.text: This mattress fit into the back of the Chev 3/4 ton truck, but it leaked the first night. We found the hole, fixed it, and used it again the next night, but it has never really held air ever since we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelmur

customer_reviews.title: great quality, inflates in no time
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about it as I only have a small tercel 99 but it works A1, great quality, inflates in no time, holds in its small gocery-style bag, really awesome.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: More than met our expectations, it has been fabulous !
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: good. If not smell too bad sheds a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: The space utilization, good. If not smell too bad sheds a lot of laundry.

Very convenient for carrying: When in use, the mattress can be fully inflated within 2 minutes. When not in use, can be quickly deflated, winded and packed. Occupies small storage room. 3. Safety. No chemical scents. won't cause skin allergy
